name: sample_id
description: unique identifier of a soil sample

name: soil_sand_coarse
description: coarse soil sand (0.5 - 2 mm) content (excluding gravel)

name: soil_sand_medium
description: medium soil sand  (0.25 - 0.5 mm) content (excluding gravel)

name: soil_sand_fine
description: fine soil sand (0.106/0.125  - 0.25 mm) content (excluding gravel)

name: soil_sand_veryfine
description: very fine soil sand (0.05/0.0625 - 0.106/0.125 mm) content (excluding gravel)

name: soil_silt_coarse
description: coarse soil silt (0.05 - 0.106 mm)  content (excluding gravel)

name: soil_silt_fine
description: fine soil silt  (0.002 - 0.02 mm) content (excluding gravel)

name: soil_C_total
description: total soil C content (organic and inorganic)

name: soil_P_method
description: method used for P extraction (to allow multiple methods in a single dataset; otherwise this can be recored as "variable metadata"

name: soil_aluminium_toxicity
description: was the soil Al concentration toxic for the crop?

name: soil_WHC_sat
description: % of soil water holding capacity that is filled

name: soil_microbial_activity_category
description: microbial activity variable name (for use in long format)

name: soil_microbial_activity_value
description: microbial activity value (for use in long format)
